statements: SELECT * FROM policy_expiration
SELECT owner_email, expiration_date FROM policy_expiration
SELECT * FROM policy_expiration WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT policy_id, property_id FROM policy_expiration WHERE owner_email = 'john.doe@example.com'
SELECT expiration_date, owner_email FROM policy_expiration ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT * FROM policy_expiration WHERE owner_email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT property_id, expiration_date FROM policy_expiration WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date, owner_email FROM policy_expiration ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, owner_email FROM policy_expiration WHERE property_id = 'b5a351b3-b76d-4aa7-ba4c-210e841c26c4' AND owner_email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies, MAX(expiration_date) AS latest_expiration FROM policy_expiration;
SELECT * FROM policy_expiration
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date FROM policy_expiration WHERE property_owner_id = 1
SELECT * FROM reminder_notifications ORDER BY notification_date DESC
SELECT policy_id, COUNT(notification_id) AS notification_count FROM reminder_notifications GROUP BY policy_id
SELECT expiration_date FROM policy_expiration WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM policy_expiration;
SELECT policy_id, expiration_date FROM policy_expiration WHERE property_owner_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM reminder_notifications WHERE notification_date >= '2023-05-10' ORDER BY notification_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, notification_date FROM reminder_notifications ORDER BY policy_id, notification_date ASC;
SELECT p.policy_id, r.notification_date FROM policy_expiration p JOIN reminder_notifications r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id WHERE p.expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM PolicyOwners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM Policies WHERE policy_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT owner_name, reminder_date, reminder_message FROM PolicyOwners JOIN Reminders ON PolicyOwners.owner_id = Reminders.owner_id;
SELECT owner_name, email, reminder_date FROM PolicyOwners LEFT JOIN Reminders ON PolicyOwners.owner_id = Reminders.owner_id;
SELECT * FROM PolicyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM PolicyOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT owner_name, email FROM PolicyOwners WHERE owner_id = 5;
SELECT po.owner_name, p.policy_start_date, r.reminder_date FROM PolicyOwners po JOIN Policies p ON po.owner_id = p.owner_id JOIN Reminders r ON po.owner_id = r.owner_id;

SELECT po.owner_name, p.policy_end_date, r.reminder_message FROM PolicyOwners po LEFT JOIN Policies p ON po.owner_id = p.owner_id LEFT JOIN Reminders r ON po.owner_id = r.owner_id WHERE p.policy_end_date >= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_owners;
SELECT policy_name FROM policies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-05-01';
SELECT owner_name, policy_name FROM policy_owners JOIN policies ON policy_owners.owner_id = policies.owner_id;
SELECT owner_name, policy_name, reminder_date FROM policy_owners JOIN policies ON policy_owners.owner_id = policies.owner_id JOIN reminders ON policies.policy_id = reminders.policy_id;
SELECT * FROM notification_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_owners WHERE owner_id = '8b8a6871-f360-4f60-9b8f-6460d2caa5e3';
SELECT owner_name, policy_expiration_date FROM policy_owners WHERE policy_expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_name, expiration_date FROM policies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT owner_name, policy_name, expiration_date FROM policy_owners JOIN policies ON policy_owners.owner_id = policies.owner_id WHERE policy_expiration_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT log_id, log_message, log_date FROM notification_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PolicyOwners ORDER BY owner_name DESC;
SELECT owner_name, address, expiration_date FROM PolicyOwners WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, policy_type FROM Policies WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Reminders WHERE reminder_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT owner_name, email FROM PolicyOwners INNER JOIN SubscriptionStatus ON PolicyOwners.owner_id = SubscriptionStatus.owner_id WHERE subscription_status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM PolicyOwners;
SELECT owner_name,email,address FROM PolicyOwners WHERE expiration_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT policy_id,policy_name FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT reminder_date,reminder_message FROM Reminders ORDER BY reminder_date DESC;
SELECT owner_id,subscription_status FROM SubscriptionStatus WHERE last_notification_date IS NOT NULL;
